reviewText: Beautiful, I own both Zen Garden Goddess and Ocean Goddess. Both yoginis are great. I personally like the ocean location a little better. It comes down to whether you prefer more buxom or more groomed. They are both worth owning. I wonder if mister Van Rose has considered doing a couple video.

When I think of yoga those are the three words I associate.  In this video we have all of that.  Well executed with confidence and a sense of peace obvious on her face.  Her body is extraordinary and uncluttered, full and natural and free from distracting tattoos.  Though there are not as many poses as in some instructional videos, it is so well photographed and paced that it is difficult to notice.  This is the third video I have seen from this organization that I have purchased and if you are a fan of beauty and looking for an exquisite yoga partner rush to make this your own.  I sincerely hope they are making another one - this one in the mountains please!

With a deft blending of ocean scenes, waves crescending and crashing creating a sensual backdrop for an exotic practicioner of the art of yoga, not restricted by clothing, it creates a calming and renewing snapshot of life. Beautifully videoed with nice dissolves and transitions to maintain the mood. A must have for your library!
Plus I have to have 16 more words to be able to submit which I am forced to do, they don't like me to just rate the product with 6 stars. What a bunch of bull.

Try to like it, but I can't.  Low budget doesn't necessary make a movie boring, whether it is to instruct or to entertain.  This DVD is doing neither.  One person, one camera and a lot of water, and there is a lot more water to look at than anything else.
very well done beautiful women I like it a lot. beautiful scenery this was very sexy but awesome dvd well done.

The yoga model is well-endowed and is fun to watch.  Good scenery in the background and the lighting is good (well obviously since its outside on the beach).  The camera shows a lot of good angles.  I recommend for fans of female nude yoga!

This relaxing and peaceful video is delightful to watch over and over again.  Only minor complaint is how tasteful the nudity is for those who'd like it to be a bit more explicit, but the girl and the scenery are lovely and the nudity is very tasteful.  Great photography too.  Definitely recommended!
Very relaxing and the woman is absolutely beautiful.  No excessive porn type feel. That was the good quality about this ...
Absolutely wonderful video beautiful beautiful beautiful model very relaxing. Thank you

The calming music, the ocean and the beauty of this woman as she goes through her yoga poses in her serenity places the viewer in a world apart from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Her nudity is presented as natural without shame or any erotic intent. All this is transmitted to the viewer as a way to enjoying their own inner peace.

Delightfully uninhibited model demonstrating beginner and intermediate poses.  Reasonably good photography tastefully (and thoroughly) done.  Some modest lighting deficiencies at times, easily overcome if your TV has a good brightness setting.  Visit the makers' website for uncensored views of the model involved to avoid any surprises on that score.

The DVD does NOT have two audio tracks (despite the package labelling offering the useful feature of being able to choose between:  "Track 1 - Music & Nature Sounds, Track 2 - Nature Sounds Only".  While Amazon sent a free replacement when I reported this, their replacement has the same improperly burned end result (perhaps they could correct their package labelling as their DVD burning capability seems not up to this).  Organized as a single track/chapter/scene that loops back to the beginning, and appears to be burned on purple dye consumer grade DVD-R media.

Since there are no chapters or scenes, you cannot readily choose which portion(s) to view but must play or fast forward to reach specific portions.  I list here the minutes into the DVD's single track when poses are first introduced (many are repeated a second time, some such as Downward Dog are done several times):

2  Lotus
7  Mountain
8  Downward Dog
9  Half Downward Dog
10  Warrior 1
12  Warrior 2
22  Half Lord of Fishes
26  Camel
31  Triangle
34  Child
35  Sphinx
37 Tree
41  Half Shoulder Stand
44  Cat
44:30  Cow
49  Bridge
51  Wheel
54:30  Happy Baby
I thought this was very well put together and was more about doing yoga than about being being nude unlike some of these other videos that seem to be more of the women showing themselves off.

Obviously, you can guess that yoga is a discipline that requires stretching and bending and flexing muscles and bones in a coordinated method that relieves pain and not create it. However, watch someone exercise has it's limited moments and then boredom happens. This instructional video is done tastefully, but yes, done in the nude while showing placement of hands, legs, arms and torso in many patterned sets. If you are looking for something else, then look elsewhere. I practice and yes in the nude, but I also realize it's not for every lifestyle or interest. I gave it four stars, not because it lacked something, but more to why a pose is better for those who are young or older or who have physical challenges and why some poses are not meant for everyone.

The model and the scenery are both very attractive, and in all honesty I really can't say what this video is missing but there is something lacking.  I would still recommend it as a rental but I'm not sure about buying  it.

You wanted a video that shows it all. You get every view that you could possibly imagine. The video is very good instruction on yoga technique, but your girlfriend might get jealous of you watching this unless she is into girls too, but even then the jealousy thing kicks in. This woman is amazing to watch !
This is a very relaxing and sensual workout.  It's a great one to do in the privacy of your own home.  I love to be able to do it  in the buff...it feels really good.
Unlike the Worship the Sun tape, this video was completely revealing of the subject.  I especially liked to see her delicate flower between her fine legs.
Excellent yoga.  I especially enjoyed the many poses that were outlined during the video.  Also, the nakedness was very fun.

Only love the beautiful ladies with amazing body, I don't expect to see more than inside it, but I think the director tried to make it so good and didn't look so cheap. The lady is not really beautiful but the breast so natural and big.
was looking at more nudity and less yoga and got tired for watching the ocean while changing to the next yoga move.
This is a great video - I wish that they would make a version of it in HD. Useful both for instruction and as a relaxation video

I am revising my first review because today when I watched this video for the third time I realized I was too negative in my first review with it. I apologize for that.

 There is nudity in this video but there is also a lot of shadow and silhouette. That was my original complaint. I guess I just expected (or wanted) more, but at any rate, I was overly harsh with my comments.

Much of it is shot into the sun so the model is in her own shadow, but sometimes the camera angle changes so that she catches the sun and is quite visible. I still wonder why they have so many shots of the ocean waves unless it's just a way to fill in time so the video is long enough to call it an hour. (It's 58 minutes.)

As far a the yoga goes, the model appears to do a very good job of performing the asanas. She is all natural.  The music is quiet and relaxing. You really can't practice along with the model because there is no verbal cueing. However if you already know yoga and have your own set of poses you could use this video for some inspiration.

There is no menu, no angle options, and no audio options even though it says on the box there is. It does restart itself when it's over so it will run in a continuous loop.

The beautiful yogini in this video takes my breath away.  Not only her beauty but also her inner glow shine through in this amazingly peaceful and well shot video.  I can't get enough of this video.  I hope we see more of her in future videos! As I, for one, will buy every one I can.  Seriously, run don't walk to get your credit card to buy this one.  You will not be disappointed!
im motivated how bout you yes yes i deffinately can do some downward dog and some sun salutations now  not to mention warrior pose 1 AND 2

I have watched other nude yoga videos and what I like about this one best is that no part of this yogini was treated as unviewable. Quite simply you can see that the body is a temple to this woman and that is a lesson we all should pay attention to. The only negative I have is this is not a typical flow practice. They move from one pose to the next without really letting the viewer get there too. In my opinion it just seems a little choppy in the flow.  As I am always looking to make my practice a little better. I know that having watched a nude body in practice it helps me to better my own because you have reference points to watch for like the dimples on the lower back, the hips and the expansion in her back in cat pose.  Thank you to the yogini as she lets us watch her practice. Please release another one soon!

I'm just a beginner at yoga and this DVD turned out to be a good fit. The yoga model was gorgeous and the poses were easy enough for me to follow along. And the beach backdrop scenery was awesome. Even the music is very cool. The sequence of standing poses and sitting poses is a perfect pacing for me- somewhat challenging but within reach. And I love the nudity- tasteful but hot enough so I find I'm looking forward to the next pose. One observation- if you want a narrated instructional video, this probably wouldn't be it. But if you're like me and prefer something beautiful to watch and get inspired, then it's perfect. It's gotten me into a daily yoga routine. One other observation- be careful to loan this out to friends, they won't give it back.

Beautiful. Simple. Respectful of both Yoga and the (female) human body.
They should have sent a copy of this with with the Voyager space probe.
Great way to relax and get in the mood for yoga, also good for keeping your attention. Great background scenery.
I thought this movie was done well, great production and provided so good instruction information of yoga, I would recommend it and will probably rent it again
Beautiful instructor is a plus, but the yoga was performed well.  I would recommend this film to all.  Thank you.
